title: Straw Hats Arrive at Little East Blue
description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at Little East Blue, an island village that has recreated various locations from the East Blue to honor their homeland. The crew is immediately excited to see familiar settings from their pasts.
significance: Introduces the setting for the Little East Blue arc and establishes the nostalgic theme of the episodes leading into Strong World film.

title: Largo's Ami Ami no Mi Revealed
description: Largo demonstrates the power of the Ami Ami no Mi (Net-Net Fruit), a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to produce sticky nets from his body. He can create different types of nets by consuming various materials, giving them properties like metal or fire.
significance: First appearance of the Ami Ami no Mi Devil Fruit, an anime-original power that becomes the primary challenge for Luffy in this arc.

quotes.text: With these nets, I have a 120% capture rate!
quotes.speaker: Largo
quotes.context: Largo boasting about his Devil Fruit abilities
